data.actual_result: You are led to some random scrolling spot.
data.expected_result: You should be led to the top of the list, since you never touched your old filter.
data.short_description: When you change filters, scroll down and go back to your old filter, the old filter appears at a random scrolling spot.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit logs. - Select "Filter by Actions", and select a filter that has enough results for you to scroll down. - Once you selected that, and the results appear, scroll down a bit. - Then, go back to your old filter (mine was just "all actions"). - Observe where it leads you when you go back.
